data.text: The game is addicting but it's almost impossible to play more then a couple rounds at a time due to the cost of each round and the amount they reward makes it impossible to get ahead unless you spend a lot of money! Your rewards don't always get credited I noticed on one of the trails the trail present that I landed on didn't credit me and that wasn't the first time! I love the graphics & the character!

Fun game but set up to make you lose!!! The game itself is really cute with great graphics but it is ridiculous how much to pay to play a level and the game is set up to where you almost HAVE to buy coins to be able to play for a decent amount of time. It is ridiculous that I have it down to one or two tiles left to get rid of and 10 spare dominoes to change and none of them match and you lose the level. I really enjoy playing it but can't seem to play that much. Do not recommend

Any good review of this game is fake or from a in game review popup for credits within the first 10 levels. Once you reach level 70 it's all down hill from there, you cannot progress any further without spending astronomical amounts of money. It's like a switch and very obvious. I blew through $8.99 (120,000 coins) In just the 8 levels following level 70. Following level 80 you will not even get halfway through a single level. This game is the definition of a bait and switch scam.

Luck Based and Pay-to-win. I ran out of coins, so it's hard to make any progress at level 120 or so, at chapter 5. The game itself is mostly luck based. Even the few times where you have a choice of more than 1 possible move, the best move is random. Oh, and every time I open the app, there's 8 pop-ups for random deals that I have to close!

This game was fun and exciting but now I am on level 10 and it takes up to 20 stars which cost 20 games to complete one task and even that would not be so bad if it gave you the opportunity to win after 5 times playing. It seems to cause you ultimately to have to spend money on the tokens needed to play the game. You can finally win if you play long enough. I do, however, like the updated trail, and I look forward to other ideas that will make it great

Great, but you can't play at one point. I actually enjoyed this game for awhile, until I wasn't able to afford paying for the next level. This game highly depends on coins, which is completely fine... but I feel as though they're forcing us to pay actual cash to keep playing. That's just my opinion. Overall! Great game, but you can't play because you need a lot of coins to buy next levels. (Please take away the coins! I just wanna play :"""")

Agree with all other reviews. Really enjoyed this game at first but then got increasingly frustrated by the obvious "cheating" of the game. I understand it wants me to buy coins but it could be a little less pushy about it. Everytime I enter the app I'm swarmed by 5 popups for offers I have to close. Every game costs money to even play so you better have coins to even play. And then when you do you can buy extra dominos to complete levels and then those won't match at all! Total scam.

The game is well-balanced overall, and highly addicting. I don't like that many times, the only way to complete challenges or levels themselves is to spend more coins, and if you run out, you're stuck waiting for either the hourly bonus or you have to spend real money to buy more.

First I had a ball playing , it felt like a mesh of dominoes and solitaire, the little side games and collecting puzzle pieces werw awesome, I try not to spend money on games, when I find one I can play and not spend makes it even better, but I did and I put the game down for a few hours, I tried to play again and it kept saying error restart over and over, my time gone, levels gone, my money gone, this has never occured before, I'll try to contact the game for help, until then I'm very disappoi

It started out kinda boring but as you get farther in it picks up and gets more challenging. I like working my brain like that but just wish I could purchase items and I can't but am glad for what I can get cuz sometimes you need help. Maybe you'll consider a few more items for free instead of asking for money to purchase. Thank you

This game cheats!!! I spin the wheel, land on a 7 and it will actually move 6 or 8 if a prize is on the 7? In the trail part of the game. Plus you cannot play without spending money and keep it that way. There are way better games out there than this one. They are cheating us all. The trail side game is a joke too. Never land on a spot with a prize but in between. I wouldn't give this game a penny!

PROS: highly addictive and entertaining. The graphics are adorable. The play is really fun, and the whole concept of the game is a lot like other progression games but it does have its own flare. CONS: it takes way too long to get the resources needed to keep going in the game. Yes, I like a challenge but not at the cost of all my money just so I can get an extra 3 dominos. Please rectify. Also, if your are giving a "free" ticket don't make us use our coins in ADDITION to that ticket.

This game could be really great except it is almost impossible to play more than once at a time without paying for attempts. Every attempt costs 2,200 gold coins. If you make a mistake there isn't much chance of correcting to win without spending more coins. The rewards are 2,300 coins for each level won unless you pay real money. Overall, I'm frustrated that there is no flow in game play.

It's fun at first, but after a couple of hours you reach a point where the hourly coins aren't enough to let you play a level. In the early levels, the hourly coins are enough to let you play, but as you progress, the coin return sadly does not increase. You have to remember to login for 5 hours just to get to play one level. This game is also heavily based on chance rather than skill. Levels often have a linear path, with no choices to make, and yet you still have to lose or pay money to win.

Could be a great game, but the gold cost to reward ratio is way to small. At the levels I'm at. It coats roughly 2000 gold to start a level, then you're only awarded 2300 if you're lucky for winning. Then you have to pay for extra moves. 2300 for one extra set of moves (3 tiles) that may end up not matching anything on the field. Sometimes my entire starting hand doesn't match anything on the field. But I already wasted 2000 coins to play the mission!

I can only give this two stars for the simple fact that it's really hard really fast, and the paywall you hit becomes apparent really quick. It was actually really fun and graphics were good, opening ads were a bit excessive but dealable. The fact that it "cost" so much to play each hand makes it almost impossible to get anywhere unless you pay. When I did pay, it only extended my game for about 15 minutes.

It's a fun game and I like the cute little characters. But, you don't get much playtime unless you're willing to fork over some money. Even then, you STILL don't get much playtime. It's unfortunate because I'll inevitably forget this game exists at some point because I'll get used to not being able to play at all. Increase the rewards after winning a level or maybe make it easier to obtain rewards from the side games?

I used to love playing this game but for the past q days I've not been able to play. I'm on level 611 , majestic kingdom and everytime I go to play it shows that I have to pay $1.99 to play, I'm sorry but I've been playing g way to long for free to start paying now. Not sure if its just a glitch or what and where it used to show how many coins I had I can barely read any of the numbers because they are so small. Please help or fix.

I agree for now. Even when they add "download and play for 31 minutes and get 20$". After.. well over an hour or more of playtime, there's no indication of the elapsed time being counted for that offer, let alone receiving the credit for it. However, yesterday, I did at least cash out 20$ worth without much hassle.

I installed this because I like Dice Dreams but this game is not fun. Once you pass the first kingdom, you can only play a few levels at a time because it costs too much to use the helps. Tiles left over when you pass the level gives you tens of coins but getting three extra tiles if you need them cost thousands of coins. It makes no sense. I don't recommend this game.

Im just using the freecash app to get to lvl 250 to dump this game once I get my $30 from playing it. Wow, have I never played a worse game than this. Superman 64 is better than this. At level 200 it cost around 8k-15k gold to win one match. You get 2k gold an hour but you have to log in and click the button. They Lie!!! About odds on spinning wheel and others things. The size of pie slice is same as others but your chance at winning is much much lower. Same with the trail. They deceive you.

Game has good graphics and concept is ok as far as playing dominoes goes but you loose money way too fast too soon and have to wait to play next level bc you won't have enough coins.game is all chance and I don't think it should be as hard to play next level. You run out of coins way too fast. I've even paid to get more and all of a sudden the cost of a level went up. If the money I paid is used in 2 turns I think something is wrong. Just too expensive!

There's a core of an okay game here that's weighed down by desperately trying to get you to pay them. Opening ads require you to click past them 8-10 times (sometimes the same one shows up again after you already dismissed it!) All of them trying to get you to pay money for events, then the coin cost to reward ratio is horrible so its easy to play one game, lose, then have to wait an hour for more coins.

Too expensive. It was pretty fun and satisfying to play at first. Then suddenly everything gets irritatingly expensive and stressful. I have to set a timer on my phone so I can farm the coins to even play at all. Why do I have to pay each lvl? At this point I'm only playing this game for my Swagbucks. I'm surprised to see all the reviews saying the same thing and the game isn't new because this feels amateur. It's dominoes and should be strategic and relaxing not strategic and stressful. Not fun

This game is actually fun AT FIRST, but you learn this very important rule: After the first chapter, the game changes drastically. Any coins that you have, no matter whether they're earned or purchased in-app, are taken from you because the game starts doing things like dealing out 10 dice in a row without a match for then on the board, and, when the supply of dice runs out, you have to buy more with your coins or lose progress that you've made. It's not fun to be taken advantage of

This game started out enjoyable. But once you get into a few levels it's almost over impossible to get through a level without purchasing additional dominos with coins. The cost goes up exponentially and drains all coins without even finishing the level. A few times if that and it's not fun anymore.

I would give the play of this game 5 stars. EXCEPT: there is NO way to advance without spending A LOT of $. I'm on level 2075 and have spent way too much. Every so many levels the cost of EVERYTHING goes up. You would think the rewards would increase as well yet they barely do. For example, a wild is twice the amount of coins you receive if you win. In 2075 levels, I've hit the jackpot maybe a couple of times. If you win "extras", they're rarely credited.

I enjoy the game but the "cost" to add extra cards or a blank one is ridiculous. Barely ever even break even. Also the wheel when spinning always lands in the same general area. Maybe move things around or allow it to spin longer. Update: The wheel continues to land on the same back up 1 button. The wheel really need to spin more or have things change up. It's getting annoying. Definitely takes away from the excitement of getting to the wheel.

I really love how this game plays but it takes so many coins to play a level, add cards, use a wild card, etc that it takes forever to progress in the game. The rewards from completing a level give you just enough coins to play one more level. And it's frustrating that, if you don't collect your coins every hour, they don't accumulate. I'd lower the cost of these things to give players more time in the game before they run out of coins - and let the coins accumulate to a certain amount.

Terrible. Costs to many coins to play to complete challenges. Gives very few dominos when you go through yours for a high cost and tr higher you get the more likely you will not get a domino you need to complete. I refuse to pay to play especially when they are so cheap on rewards and obviously it is rigged. More frustrating than worth my time. I give it a zero! Oh and way to many boards to complete to complete a challenge. Not worth the headache.

I first gave this app 5 stars because it was a blast to play and they didn't charge the same amount of coins to play a level as the coins you earned when winning a level. Whoever thought of that concept sux. This game is cute and fun but it doesn't take long until the AI wins against you everytime and the levels start to cost more and more and you barely win what it costs. I've played for 3 days, can no longer play because I don't have enough coins to do so because the levels got so impossible.

This game is designed to make you spend a lot of money. At first the levels only cost a few coins to play and its fairly easy to advance. You're given free coins every hour but the game is designed to make you spend money so it will take me DAYS to advance a single level because you use up all of your dominos and it will require you to pay to advance. Even the rewards are bogus, not enough given to play a level. I'm fed up and tired of spending money to play a game. I'd almost rather watch ads.

Like the game layout but can not get ahead or earn enough coins to keep going through levels even with multipliers. It takes to much to get to the end of level with increasing the amount of coins to continue to finish the level. Surely there's other options to offer other than in app purchases on every level to stay moving thru the levels. Take less and/or give more incentive to keep playing besides in-app purchases on every level!

Horrendous game. Each level costs in-game currency and the amount you receive for winning the level barely covers the cost. Added to that the game seems designed to make you lose with the options being given not matching what you need, and the cost of extending by 3 cards is more than the level itself cost. You quickly run out of in-game currency often leaving no option but to buy with real money. The only reason I'm playing is to try to earn Swagbucks, but I am sorely regretting it!

Could be a great game but they are too greedy and make it so you have to spend a lot of real money to complete any level. The amount of coins it's costs to get any of the help bits is just huge and not in line with any rewards you get. I don't have an issues spending money on games if its fair and rewards are inline but they really aren't in this one. Don't bother playing unless you want to spend hundreds just to complete a few levels. No longer fun

OK game if you're bored, graphics are good. Unfortunately clearly designed to make users pay, the levels are rigged and cost way too much to play especially if you're losing a lot on one level. Sometimes you complete a bunch in a row, most times I'm stuck on 1 level for a few days. Also way too many pop ups especially when opening the game. Have to exit out of each one all different locations to press close. Frustrating and cant play more than 10 minutes a day

Very enjoyable game. Unfortunately it's very hard to progress without spending a lot of money on it. A lot of it is impossible because of the short time you get to collect things to benefit your progress. The price of each game rises as you progress so the hourly prize cash is enough to play one game. If u don't complete it u wait another hour to play again.. needs to be cheaper or more free plays.

I came on here yo say EXACTLY what everyone is saying. When I first downloaded it I really enjoyed it. It is a lot of fun. But once you run out of coins (which happens quickly because you win less than you spend on many rounds) it is impossible to play. I played dice dreams and you get tonnes of bonuses, but this game if you don't get the 2000 every hour, it doesn't even accumulate. I hope they change it to be more like dice dreams.

Manipulative game, game where you pay more coin than rewards, pay to win First 100 levels are good and you'll enjoy it but then It becomes pay to win game as every level require booster no matter how good you play. Even if you have 3-4 cards, you should be sure you won't be able to clear last one domino as it seems to manipulated game. I have played 270 levels and in last 150 levels, I had to use boosters in at least 125 of those to clear level.

It's actually pretty bad. Upon downloading you can play continuously for about half an hour until the coins are gone, then it's just about impossible to play and finish one round without collecting coins every hour for a day. Very hard to win most levels as it's not a game of strategy and thinking. Often start with tiles that don't even match the first tile. I do not think anyone should waste their time downloading it.

Love the game, but it doesn't matter how well you play you will lose almost every game. Then when you buy 3 more dominoes to try and finish the round almost always finish on the first domino purchased. It really is too bad, I really like the game, but I'll be quitting soon. The odds here are worse than a casino it should have skill count more than having the dominoes stacked against you. If the buy-in was cheaper I probably wouldn't feel so cheated on almost every game.

Absolutely atrocious the fact you have to buy extra cards for at least 5 000 or a gold domino for 10,00 even to go back can cost up to 15,00 and upward. The fact you have to pay for each game which is 2,400 at its lowest is disgusting, you are never gaining anything only breaking even. And also the dominoes don't usually get dealt fairly so you have to buy add on in the end anyway to try and complete a game thus costing more as I've said in the beginning. The only way to play is to buy coins.

Started playing the game and was quite interested in it and then I went to spend the winners wheel and I landed on the best prize possible which I believe was 75,000 coins and something else. I'll verify that soon once I can see what's in the winner's wheel again. Is there a way for the creators to go in and verify that I hit that win to give me my coins? I really wanted to give this game a higher rating, but because of this I can't.

Better than their other game, a bit more time-consuming, but theres actual gameplay that you have to do yourself. It has the same issue of spamming their offers on screen way too often like the dice game, though, remove that, and it might be a lot less annoying to play

One star is for the fact I had to get on a completely different device from what I play this game on just to write a review. dominoes in the world physical or computer data Style on either one the process of the game is you should be able to make it from the first Domino to the last in succession. When you guys clearly make it where none of them match in succession and the ones you have to pay for with points only give percentage of a chance to match that is called rigged for stealing money!

This game is insanely stingy. Stick to a solitaire harvest game. Even in the early levels it requires boosts to pass the levels and if you are lucky enough to pass a level without a boost you basically get your coins back. I spent money on this game and didn't even get enough coins to pass 5 levels. Even the event rewards are pathetic " Beat 50 levels and maybe you can have enough coins for one level and a undo boost."

Game is THIRSTY for your cash. Obviously mobile games need to entice you to spend money in order to be profitable, but this one is infuriating in its pursuit of your wallet. Enjoy being given literally unplayable openings and playing (but not winning) one level an hour once you get to higher levels. (Reached level 189).

This is an incredible game! Problems areas: its still like all the other incredible games. You get in, get hooked, accumulate and to a certain extent, if you can't pay, you can barely play. You'll see like I did, if not already, by level 60. Happy playing!

I'm not a fan of dominoes and this game started really slow for me, but now that I've advanced a few levels I'm really starting to enjoy it. it's definitely not a fast paced game and there is some strategy involved if you want to finish out a game without having to "buy" extra dominoes!

At first i thought that it is addictive and loved too much.. but i soon realized that it is totally unfair game in every single detail.. tiles score, gifts, boosters cost.. also challenges are so incapable in low standards!! It is not favorite at all any more!! Uninstall!!

Very good game. Graphics are beautiful. It just never seems to give enough of a reward. You've got a level that cost $5,000 almost 10,000 coins and you're only giving $2,500 to start. And then you run out and there's no way to make it back. The rewards need to be a lot better

So far I am very impressed with the game. I made it to level 35, chapter 2 and there hasn't been one ad! Only a few in game offers but not in a harassing way. Also the difficulty from level to level isn't too much, smooth game play. Thanks guys!

This game can be fun but you take the fun out of a game when everything is costly. The stars are the most RIDICULOUS part of it all..you get 1 star when you complete a level but it takes 20 stars to build one building in the chapter. Unless you are willing to always spend money on this game you won't procede very far.

Love this version of Dice Dreams. Domino Dreams has awesome graphics, smooth animations, fun characters, and build-a-town style gaming. The Domino's games are challenging without being too difficult up to level 20. Looking forward to playing again tomorrow.

It updated to nothing different. The side bonus don't last long enough. You wipe out all our coins with ridiculous amounts to play each level or get help. You can't play long enough to have any real fun. It was ok 👌 at best, at first. But it not any more.

MOST BRAINDEAD EXCUSE FOR A "GAME" DO NOT PLAY THIS. Typically, in every game, there is a way to win, but in Domino Dreams, every "level" is a gamble, you can make every right move and still have to pay to win, it's insanity. AVOID AT ALL COSTS

It takes time after u click on it before u can play first it will try 10 times to sell you stuff even before u get to the game itself , plus while I was writing this it took over my phone. It min this and bring backup the game I wasn't in the game but here so I would say it can control your phone as it shouldn't have popped up at all wow

Too many annoying pop ups. Pointless & repetitive tasks in ridiculous chapters. I just want to play a simple & minimal game. If I want to buy anything, I know where the shop is & don't need to see your dumb offers & junky notifications everytime!

I absolutely love this game and never in my life played dominos!!! As a matter of fact, I hated even looking at them (guess I needed colors 😂). However, I can't see paying to play games....esp at these rates! Games are supposed to be fun Not stressful because of REAL money!

I feel the games are rigged most of the time, the levels cost too much, you have to play one level 5 to 10 times to win or until they let you, an also not everyone can purchase coins like come on its too much at times

There's a special place in hell for those who make games insanely pay to win and I hope the devs of this game suffer there soon. These greedy wastes of oxygen intentionally made the game look easy at first, but after about level 20 or so you start losing more coins than you win, ultimately leading you down a whirlpool that will take you either to your wallet or here to rant about how bad this game inevitably becomes. Seriously, don't waste your time on this disgrace of an app. It's not worth it.

Fun & helps me to keep my brain 🧠 sharp. Keeps me busy and entertained for hours 😀. Great graphics and really fun mini games. Everyone should try because I know that you won't regret it. I know I didn't. And am turning on all my friends and family. So far everyone that I have I have to try it, has enjoyed it and is telling all their friends and family about it as well. I have also tried if you have the other games and have had the same experience.

Great in the beginning, then get to stage 3/4 and impossible to attain any of the dominoes..whenever you want to use a substitute coin, it repeats those you don't have on board!! Don't use!! Rip off!!!!!

This game is fun and addictive..but I have to give it a bad review because you can only play levels once an hour and that is not worth it..its so high to play one level and they make it almost impossible to beat the level the first couple of times and it takes all your coins..then you have to wait another complete hour to play again..if it don't change will uninstall and not play..I like a game that I can actually play and move forward..not play one level and have to wait.

I bought the Enchanted Path for$1.99. It took it off my PayPal, but I didn't get the rewards in the game. Also suppose to unlock the next two, but never did that also. Hopefully, you can help fix the problem. I would rate higher if so. But the game is pretty fun.

I would give this game 5 stars if I could advance without spending money. It's a lot of fun to play until you hit level 100 or so. Then it becomes nearly impossible to beat a level in one try, and you end up spending all your coins in a short time to advance. Once your reserves are depleted you can hardly play anymore.

I'd like to leave a review just to say I've never ever spent money on a game ever!!! But before you ever get to play this Domino game you get a dozen ads from $1.99-$5.99 over and over then you have 15 dominos and flip every1 and get nothing close to the 1 you need until you spend money then you'll get the domino you need THIS GAME IS RUGHED FOR MONEY!!!!

This is a cute game. Graphics are great and is very user friendly. But you can't get ahead in the game. Everything you need to do to play cost's 2 and 3 time's more than your winnings. So you can't play but a few games at a time. Really needs improvement and adjusting.

Doesn't always give u what u purchase tho it takes the money off the card. The trail. Changes so quickly u can never get to the end. I play daily and 2 times now I've had issues getting purchased items. I've emailed and feel like I'm not being taken seriously. It was fun first I play for playtime and earn money when I play. U make it harder to get anywhere with this game

It's fun for a few days then it becomes aggravating and to play. The free gold every hour doesn't give you enough because if you need more dominoes and have to spend gold it runs out, and if you need just 1 domino and pay for 3 extra none of then will be the one you need and won't have enough to buy more and have to wait again to get at least 3 more free gold chances to even try to continue which takes hours

A really quick and witty game. Then make you think ahead a couple moves. Definitely got my brain working a little bit faster. . I would recommend it for anybody. That wants to think a little faster in life. The actual game itself is Fun and entertaining. And definitely passes the time pretty fast.

I enjoy this game somewhat, but you lose a lot of coins without gaining anything if you're unable to complete a level. I wish the hourly bonus carried over by itself and not have to be collected every hour like Dice Dreams does. This game really needs to be updated to make it more user friendly. If not, I won't be playing for long. Just as with most games, this game is all about how much money they can make off of each player.
Way to expensive. You charge more then what you get back. If you wish to pay a unreasonable amount then play but I just deleted it. Not worth the price..sorry puzzles fun, but to expensive to play..

Really good game, but if you run out of coins to enter and play the next level you have to wait 1 hour each time till you get some more there is no option to get some free coins which is a shame as sometimes on some levels you do just actually run out of dominos!

Games cost too much. Especially when you don't get but 2000 coins per hour. No extra lives smh. Only 1 spon of the wheel every 20 levels I don't think thats enough. Puzzle game isn't working at least not for me. No daily sign in/ play incentive. And the stars for story game play/ moving the story along require more than the game allows. Too much for nothing..... just not feeling this game to much.

Lots of mini games. The higher you go, the more the domino varieties you have (mouse trap, cookies, hidden, etc), making it more challenging. If you run out of coins, it isn't long before you can go again. Fun game!

Very generous, engaging and cute game! The only thing I would suggest changing is using a life or energy system to play levels instead of gold (balance its gain/cost and leave it for power ups only), this would heavely decrease downtime. Remember: happy players are far more likely to spend/stay than frustrated ones. Kudos on the game!
Once you finish closing too many pop up screens, the game can be addictive. It's tough to stay afloat though, as the rewards aren't large enough. You almost have to pay to play

Could be so much fun but you earn FAR too few coins to play the game. The game limits you to one try everytime if you lose the level, which happens very often, so you can never play the game for more than 5 minutes. Again one of those games that if you don't pay you won't have fun playing the game.

It's ridiculous at how many games you lose. I had 500,000 coins,with each game costing 26,000 coins to play. That's about 20 games. I only won 3, a lot of time ending with one domino left. They obviously want you to use a booster. Three additional dominoes costs 54,000 coins,and there is no guarantee that you will get what you need. The gold domino, which is like a wild card, costs 65,000 coins. I'm not new to this game. I've been playing for around a year. I'm tired of the bullsh*t.

Love this game! Collect things to win coins and goodies. At level 100 you can double the amount you win. It's not too hard and very fun. I love the graphics and rich colours and the animations run smoothly. I also love the characters, especially the big one ^.^

I'm liking this game less and less. The costs to play keeps going up and when you do win its not even close to the amount you have to pay to play. It's sad because I do like this game but I'm not spending a bunch of money just to play. I'm taking back 3 of my stars. It's not much fun after awhile because I don't have enough tokens to play, until the next hour and I'm not buying anymore tokens. ☆☆

The game is fun, its a domino game, not much you can do wrong, but having to click my way through 10-15 pop ups when opening the app, most of these trying to get me to pay money, before being able to even play a level is super annoying and makes me not want to open the app.

The game rewards are low vs. the charges for coins in game play! Winning 5 boards in a row, easily being down 50k coins, is a joke! The tiles when buying extra turns seem highly rigged, and you can bet more than not you are buying w/coins at least 2 3 paks with each costing more than previous. Dust bin future!!!! Don't want me to play your game, fine!

Great game I love it but you need to be able to win coins to keep playing & you don't win enough, I play the game for a few days, then have to stop for days building up my free coins again, also the tiles to help you progress, ie gold extra tile, 3 extra tiles etc. How are we supposed to get them? Getting very frustrating 😔

It will take you for everything you have built up and when you don't play it for a few days it will let you win all day and then when you think it is not a bad game it takes everything you have and the only way to keep from losing everything is to stop playing once it starts to try to take all of your coins, if I could give it a lesser rating I would

It's frustrating that you have to log in every hour to collect coins. The coins should just be automatically added each hour like all your other games. Each level cost a ridiculous amount of coins. Even if you win the level without using any wild cards or +3, you only actually gain about 200 coins. When it costs 10k coins to play 1 level and you are only getting 2300 coins each time you log in to collect, it's impossible to play this game daily. You have to spend days collecting to play 15m.

It's a fun game but only up to a certain level. Then it's clearly designed to make you have to use coins to complete a level. Sure, the point of these games are for them to make money but it's so obvious. Gets you to 1 domino and the makes you need to pay. Uninstall

Gorgeous game to look at but it gets near impossible to play; there are features that cause me stress and I don't like it when my 'games' cause me stress; it's not fun. ie: the hinged tiles, the fruit dominoes and the red carpet roll. It's tedious and stressful that I don't know how much longer I can stomach it

I really like this game drawback costs too many coins to play round. There should be more rewards. I know why they're isn't because y'all want us to spend money so that y'all can make money. On the trail game we should get the rewards the animal passes over & especially when you get on the 50 it should land on a reward.

The way the coins are done in this game are horrible. You only win like 2,200-2,400coins but yet you have to turn right around and spend 2000 just to play next level. SMH doesnt make no since. The way the domino are dealt doesn't really give you a chance fairly. This game is pointless and more aggravating than worth playing.

From the same creators as Dice Dreams, I love this game! The graphics are so inviting. I know this sounds like a cliche but seriously I'm having a horrid day and this actually made me smile. (My best friend of 56 years passed and I'm doing anything to not face it). So if it can put a smile here and today? It's worth 5 stars. Thanks for another winning and fun filled game.

So I've been trying to connect my Facebook to this game on my tablet which is also on my cell phone. Once you connect your Facebook to your game there's no way to disconnect it. I went into Facebook and disconnected all games from there, shut down & restarted my tablet and my phone I reinstalled the games and when I reinstall them it said that it was already connected to facebook. It's connected to the same Facebook account on my tablet as it is on my phone but it won't let the games sync up 😭

Great little game! Fun, relaxing, and not too many ads or upsales. You DON'T have to spend money to play and win. But if you want to spend a few dollars the in-game offers are actually good little deals for a few bucks.

Each time I open the game, I get an absurd number of popups about every event and special deal and microtransaction going on at the moment. I counted 8 separate popups when opening it today, 9 if you count the same one that popped up twice in a row. One or two I understand, but 8? Seriously?

It's okay and addictive, it gets boring though, there's no leaderboards, no events where you compete with teams or be able to join a team, there's just nothing to it really other then going through levels.

It is a fun quick pace game, I been able to make it to level 36 without having to make any in game purchases, so that's pretty good but they have some pretty good bundles that I seen if you do need to make any purchases in the game.

I did like this game, but every attempt at playing it costs you. Once you1ve used your tokens, you have to pay cash. This spoils what could be a great game. It would be better to give player`s five life`s at a time, similar to other games.Besides that, the game is nice to play.

It would be five stars but unless you want to level up really slow it's a pay to play game they only give u one free play every hour and no extra coins for perks like wild card which is also REALLY expensive to get they should lower the price for extras and think about giving a little more than one free play every hour other than that game is gr8 and would be five stars

Too greedy. It cost thousands to play a level, but you only win a couple hundred. So you run out of coins fast. I would be willing to buy coins if it was more balanced, but I'm not giving money to a game that is setting me up to fail.
